Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centreabove two white bands; exterior: painted decoration (fired reddish) consisting of bull (part of back with pattern decoration remaining) to right; part of rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 263, no. 548)
Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. V, no. 50)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0442) (phase 2)
